```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, fig.width = 19, fig.height = 9)

source(here::here("visuals/create-plots.R"))
```

# {.tabset}

## Region {.tabset}

### Count

```{r hhcount count}

hhc_re <- create_plots("household-count", 1, "count", "Region")

hhc_re_hhsize <- create_plots("household-count", 2, "count", "Region")

iwalk(hhc_re$plots, ~print(.x))

iwalk(hhc_re_hhsize$plots, ~print(.x))

```

### Shares

```{r hhcount share}

hhs_re <- create_plots("household-count", 1, "share", "Region")

hhs_re_hhsize <- create_plots("household-count", 2, "share", "Region")

iwalk(hhs_re$plots, ~print(.x))

iwalk(hhs_re_hhsize$plots, ~print(.x))

```

## King {.tabset}

```{r hhcount count king}

hhc_re_k <- create_plots("household-count", 1, "count", "King")

hhc_re_hhsize_k <- create_plots("household-count", 2, "count", "King")

iwalk(hhc_re_k$plots, ~print(.x))

iwalk(hhc_re_hhsize_k$plots, ~print(.x))
```

### Shares

```{r hhcount share king}

hhs_re_k <- create_plots("household-count", 1, "share", "King")
```
